data.text: @UnwantedGuest3 Google VA study, they looked at 150k post covid patients very interesting and alarming.
@UnwantedGuest3 @leaver_emma Might be worth a read @MikeLoveridge23 if you can get hold of it.

@UnwantedGuest3 Thanks so much . I'm not the only one but it's immensely hard isn't it to keep going through this when all you have is hope . I appreciate this is a new disease but I've seen my brother struggle with ME for years too .
@UnwantedGuest3 Hope e both pull out of this!
@gtcjo Yes I’ve just seen that. Odd.
@PhilM64 Yeah - given the complexity of the subject I think it was covered reasonably well.

@EllaSloman I’m really sorry. No one should go through this alone. It’s criminal that so many have been neglected. And not just #longcovid either - chronic illness sufferers too. And for decades. Such a lottery as to whether you get a decent clinic or not too. Hang in there. Xx

@cereal_twit Oh no I’m really sorry to hear that. I’ve had major GI issues since acute infection and now getting some stool analysis done to see what is happening (this was following hospital admission over Xmas for suspected IBD). This is an arse alright. I hope your relapse ends soon.

@UnwantedGuest3 Was just messaging you a month ago about how I've managed to get back to working out and feeling super positive. Right after that, got hit with an IBS flare up which is entering week 4. Started post-COVID. It has wiped me out with fatigue. Just miserable.
